sqlMap.select:
SELECT USERS_REGIST_IDX, DOMAIN, USERS_REGIST_ID, USERS_REGIST_NAME, USERS_REGIST_PASSWD, USERS_REGIST_JUMIN1, USERS_REGIST_JUMIN2, USERS_REGIST_DEPARTMENT, USERS_REGIST_LICENCENUM FROM USERS_REGIST
USERS_REGIST_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#strKeyword#,'%')
USERS_REGIST_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#strKeyword#,'%')
CONCAT(USERS_REGIST_JUMIN1 ,'-', USERS_REGIST_JUMIN2) = #strKeyword#
USERS_REGIST_DEPARTMENT LIKE CONCAT('%',#strKeyword#,'%')
USERS_REGIST_LICENCENUM LIKE CONCAT('%',#strKeyword#,'%')
ORDER BY $orderCol$ $orderType$ LIMIT $SKIP$, $USERS_LISTNUM$

SELECT USERS_REGIST_IDX, DOMAIN, USERS_REGIST_ID, USERS_REGIST_NAME, USERS_REGIST_PASSWD, USERS_REGIST_JUMIN1, USERS_REGIST_JUMIN2, USERS_REGIST_DEPARTMENT, USERS_REGIST_LICENCENUM FROM USERS_REGIST
USERS_REGIST_IDX = #USERS_REGIST_IDX#
USERS_REGIST_ID = #USERS_REGIST_ID#
DOMAIN = #DOMAIN#

SELECT COUNT(USERS_REGIST_IDX) CNT FROM USERS_REGIST
USERS_REGIST_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#strKeyword#,'%')
USERS_REGIST_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#strKeyword#,'%')
CONCAT(USERS_REGIST_JUMIN1 ,'-', USERS_REGIST_JUMIN2) = #strKeyword#
USERS_REGIST_DEPARTMENT LIKE CONCAT('%',#strKeyword#,'%')
USERS_REGIST_LICENCENUM LIKE CONCAT('%',#strKeyword#,'%')
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO USERS_REGIST ( USERS_REGIST_IDX, DOMAIN, USERS_REGIST_ID, USERS_REGIST_NAME, USERS_REGIST_PASSWD, USERS_REGIST_JUMIN1, USERS_REGIST_JUMIN2, USERS_REGIST_DEPARTMENT, USERS_REGIST_LICENCENUM ) VALUES (
#USERS_REGIST_IDX#,
NEXTVAL('USERS_REGIST'),
#DOMAIN#, #USERS_REGIST_ID#, #USERS_REGIST_NAME#, #USERS_REGIST_PASSWD#, #USERS_REGIST_JUMIN1#, #USERS_REGIST_JUMIN2#, #USERS_REGIST_DEPARTMENT#, #USERS_REGIST_LICENCENUM# )
sqlMap.delete:
DELETE FROM USERS_REGIST
USERS_REGIST_IDX = #USERS_REGIST_IDX#
USERS_REGIST_ID = #USERS_REGIST_ID#
DOMAIN = #DOMAIN#
